title: Is Istikhara valid if I read the dua from a book if I didn't memorize it? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: fazana from australia she says is the estejara still valid when i don't memorize the dua but i read it from a book the answer is 100 percent it is still valid not everybody can memorize the dua especially in an arabs so if you pray the two raka's you finish and you open the booklet and you read the dua this is totally legit you
